house_listing.house_description: This 1 level detached single family home built in 1968 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1648 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: One Source Realty/Better Homes One Source Realty/Better Homes

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
